game_description: Hyperstacks is a VR Action-Puzzle-Platformer-Sandbox game packed with a Powerful Level Editor! Currently on Alpha stage: By purchasing it now on App Lab you will get alpha tester rewards on the beta release plus earlier updates to these the new things in-game! Solving puzzles and crushing enemies is your goal! Fight against enemies, climb walls, solve puzzles, dodge traps, and much more! Explore your creative side and immerse yourself into our fully-fledged VR level editor! Create amazing levels, Enjoy community-created content, and interact with other players!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Hyper stacks is so cool because its literally a VR platformer and you can make levels like Mario maker and you can play other peoples levels as well. NOW I AM PRETTY CERTAIN YOU CAN PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS!
review_2: Awesome game, lots of replay ability, cool artstyle, and good modeling. I feel like it’s a little too ‘neon’ though and the tutorials could use a little bit more explanation. Though I understand that the tutorials will likely change over time, as the game is still being worked on and has AMAZING potential. The creators seem to listen to their fans (with them asking for a jump button and it being added in the form of an item), and it actually runs on my crappy quest 1. Sorta. It runs well enough to have a good time. I am definitely looking forward to the direction this game goes in!!
review_4: This game is really fun and pretty challenging as well! The level editor is easy to use and the community levels are also great. Keep up the good work!
review_5: We have multiplayer but we need more! Which mean we need to see like 10 or more lobby’s to join. Also we need another update lol.
